import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { readingTracker } from '../services/readingTracker'; import ReadingTracker from '../components/ReadingTracker'; import { FaChartBar, FaNewspaper, FaFolder, FaBookOpen } from 'react-icons/fa'; const HomePage: React.FC = () => { const [showTracker, setShowTracker] = useState(false); const [stats, setStats] = useState(readingTracker.getReadingStats()); useEffect(() => { // Update stats every minute const interval = setInterval(() => { setStats(readingTracker.getReadingStats()); }, 60000); return () => clearInterval(interval); }, []); return (
